data.actual_result: The voice lines don't disappear when your microphone off.
data.expected_result: The voice lines don't disappear even though your microphone off.
data.short_description: When you turn off your microphone, the voice lines stay there.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to User Settings > Voice & Video - At the MIC TEST press the "Let's Check" button. - Talk and off your microphone. - Press "Stop Testing" button. - Press again the "Let's Check" button. - The voice lines stay there.
